product_name: Owala FreeSip Twist Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel, BPA-Free, 24-oz, Pink/Purple (Dreamy Field)
description: Similar to your favorite FreeSip bottle, but with a style thatâ€™s all its own. The FreeSip Twist has a sleek design that makes it easy to grab and store, a carry loop on the lid, and of course, our one and only FreeSip spout that lets you sip and swig.

latest_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype -
latest_reviews.review: I absolutely love this water bottle and bring it with me everywhere I go. Very insulated so ice stays intact for hours upon hours. Can drink through the straw like a sippy cup or use the other side to pour like a regular water bottle. Super easy to clean as everything comes apart including the straw inside. Only downside was that I dropped it on the pavement once and it dented and got scratched up really easily just from the one fall.

latest_reviews.title: A dream to clean
latest_reviews.review: This bottle is amazing! It doesn't leak in my work bag, is easy to carry by the handle, and it keeps water cold for hours. It's also super easy to clean, which is a huge plus for me.

latest_reviews.title: Perfect Bottle
latest_reviews.review: I love love love this water bottle! I love the straw inside, the lid and the colour scheme. My go to water bottle for pilates, yoga and the gym!

latest_reviews.title: Worth every penny
latest_reviews.review: This is perfect in many ways: keeps water cold at all times; fits perfectly in side pocket of backpacks; beautiful sleek design and not very heavy.

latest_reviews.title: Favourite water bottle
latest_reviews.review: I absolutely love this water bottle and bring it with me everywhere I go. Very insulated so ice stays intact for hours upon hours. Can drink through the straw like a sippy cup or use the other side to pour like a regular water bottle. Super easy to clean as everything comes apart including the straw inside. Only downside was that I dropped it on the pavement once and it dented and got scratched up really easily just from the one fall.

latest_reviews.title: Favourite Bottle
latest_reviews.review: I love this bottle! It's so easy to clean and it keeps my drinks cold all day long. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a new water bottle.
